attributes.action: Stop the £24bn defence cut and give serving soldiers the much needed equipmnet they NEED and help stop the number of lives that are being lost in the war zone!! Stop sending young soldiers to their deaths!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition comes after 10 soldiers have lost their lives within 7 days! As much as we the people understand the importance of our soldiers being in Afghanistan, we do not find it acceptable for mp's to sit behind their 'safe' desks and decalir that such loss of life is acceptable and inevitable when they do not provide the correct and/or the much needed equipment. Please help us to make a stand in 'hope' of getting the government to support those they send out to war zones and see the soldiers as people and not just statistics! Please help support or troops!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the £24bn defence cut and give serving soldiers the much needed equipmnet they NEED and help stop the number of lives that are being lost in the war zone!! Stop sending young soldiers to their deaths!.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Helptroops
